title: Colorite CL7958050CEZ 5/8" x 50' Kink Free Heavy Duty Hose
description: The PressureMASTER water hose features an excellent 500 PSI burst strength coupled with a wide 5/8-inch inside diameter which means this high-pressure garden hose can withstand a large volume of water flowing through it at great speed. For optimal kink resistance, this high-pressure water hose was crafter with a unique octagonal shape, as well as Swan's patented Hose Armour at the female coupling to resist kinking at the water source.
